description: Describes the capacity and rental availability of the station

last_updated.description: Last time the data in the feed was updated in RFC3339 format.

ttl.description: Number of seconds before the data in the feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed).

version.description: GBFS version number to which the feed conforms, according to the versioning framework (added in v1.1).

data.description: Array that contains one object per station as defined below.

num_vehicles_available.description: Number of vehicles of any type physically available for rental at the station.

vehicle_types_available.description: Array of objects displaying the total number of each vehicle type at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

vehicle_type_id.description: The vehicle_type_id of vehicle at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

count.description: A number representing the total amount of this vehicle type at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

num_vehicles_disabled.description: Number of disabled vehicles of any type at the station.

num_docks_available.description: Number of functional docks physically at the station.

num_docks_disabled.description: Number of empty but disabled docks at the station.

is_installed.description: Is the station currently on the street?

is_renting.description: Is the station currently renting vehicles?

is_returning.description: Is the station accepting vehicle returns?

last_reported.description: The last time this station reported its status to the operator's backend in RFC3339 format.

vehicle_docks_available.description: Object displaying available docks by vehicle type (added in v2.1-RC).

vehicle_type_ids.description: An array of strings where each string represents a vehicle_type_id that is able to use a particular type of dock at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

count.description: A number representing the total number of available docks for the defined vehicle type (added in v2.1-RC).
